meanings: (몸이) (상처 등이) painful, sore, (병으로) sick, ill, (동사로 쓰여) hurt, ache
외과 Please tell me if it hurts.

vlive.korean: 아프면... If you get sick... 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 깜짝🦦
진짜 아프면 안 돼 우리 아가새들 알았죠? You can't get sick, okay, IGOT7? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 쉼표방
vlive.english: You can't get sick, okay, IGOT7?

vlive.korean: 그리고 그러면 또 안 되고 아프면 해야지 그거... You shouldn't get sick. If you get sick... 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 깜짝🦦
vlive.english: You shouldn't get sick. If you get sick...

vlive.korean: 아프면 안돼! Don't get sick! 듣기 View video ITZY : 챌💕
진짜 너무 아프면... When something hurts so much... 듣기 View video TWICE : 모 생일🍑
